name: Tasly Danshen Plus Capsule
description: Premium cardiovascular support with Danshen (Salvia) root. Promotes healthy blood circulation and heart function.
longDescription: Tasly Danshen Plus Capsule combines traditional Chinese medicine wisdom with modern biotechnology. Made from premium Danshen (Salvia miltiorrhiza) root extract, this product supports cardiovascular health, promotes healthy blood circulation, helps maintain normal blood pressure, and protects heart function. Each capsule contains standardized Danshen extract for consistent quality and effectiveness.

name: Tasly Cordyceps Mycelium Capsule
description: Premium Cordyceps sinensis for energy, immunity, and respiratory health support.
longDescription: Tasly Cordyceps Mycelium Capsule harnesses the power of Cordyceps sinensis, a prized traditional ingredient. This supplement boosts energy and stamina, enhances immune function, supports respiratory health, and improves overall vitality. Each capsule contains concentrated cordyceps mycelium extract cultivated under controlled conditions for maximum potency.

name: Tasly Ginseng RH2 Capsule
description: Advanced ginseng formula with rare ginsenoside Rh2 for immune support and vitality.
longDescription: Tasly Ginseng RH2 Capsule features rare ginsenoside Rh2, a powerful compound from premium ginseng. This advanced formula provides superior immune support, enhances energy and mental clarity, supports healthy aging, and promotes overall wellness. The Rh2 compound is known for its potent bioactive properties.

name: Tasly Propolis Soft Capsule
description: Natural bee propolis for immune support and antioxidant protection.
longDescription: Tasly Propolis Soft Capsule contains premium bee propolis extract rich in flavonoids and natural compounds. This powerful supplement boosts immune system function, provides antioxidant protection, supports oral and throat health, and has natural antibacterial properties. Each soft capsule delivers concentrated propolis for maximum effectiveness.

name: Tasly Ganoderma (Reishi) Capsule
description: Premium Reishi mushroom extract for immune support and stress management.
longDescription: Tasly Ganoderma Capsule features premium Ganoderma lucidum (Reishi mushroom) extract. Known as the 'Mushroom of Immortality,' this supplement supports immune function, helps manage stress, promotes restful sleep, and supports liver health. Rich in polysaccharides and triterpenes for comprehensive wellness support.

name: Tasly Ginkgo Capsule
description: Ginkgo biloba extract for brain health, memory, and circulation support.
longDescription: Tasly Ginkgo Capsule contains standardized Ginkgo biloba leaf extract. This powerful formula supports brain health and cognitive function, enhances memory and mental clarity, improves blood circulation to the brain, and provides antioxidant protection. Ideal for maintaining mental sharpness and focus.

name: Tasly Hepatone Capsule
description: Herbal liver support formula for detoxification and liver health.
longDescription: Tasly Hepatone Capsule is a specialized liver support formula combining traditional herbs. This product supports healthy liver function, aids in natural detoxification processes, promotes liver cell regeneration, and protects against oxidative stress. Essential for maintaining optimal liver health.

name: Tasly Digest Natural
description: Natural digestive support with herbs and enzymes for gut health.
longDescription: Tasly Digest Natural combines traditional herbs with digestive enzymes for comprehensive digestive support. This formula promotes healthy digestion, relieves occasional bloating and discomfort, supports regular bowel movements, and maintains gut health. Perfect for daily digestive wellness.

name: Tasly Chitosan Capsule
description: Marine-derived fiber for weight management and cholesterol support.
longDescription: Tasly Chitosan Capsule features high-quality chitosan from marine sources. This natural fiber supplement supports weight management by binding dietary fats, helps maintain healthy cholesterol levels, promotes digestive health, and supports natural detoxification. An excellent addition to a healthy lifestyle.

name: Tasly Deepure Tea
description: Detoxifying herbal tea blend for cleansing and wellness.
longDescription: Tasly Deepure Tea is a carefully crafted herbal blend for natural detoxification and wellness. This therapeutic tea supports liver and kidney function, promotes natural cleansing, aids in toxin elimination, and provides antioxidant benefits. Enjoy 2-3 cups daily for optimal wellness support.

name: Tasly IceBerry Juice
description: Antioxidant-rich berry juice for beauty, energy, and wellness.
longDescription: Tasly IceBerry Juice combines premium berries and natural ingredients for comprehensive wellness. This delicious juice provides powerful antioxidants, supports skin health and radiance, boosts energy naturally, and promotes overall vitality. Rich in vitamins, minerals, and anthocyanins.
